Spellbooks.name: Adhere
Spellbooks.description: An object is covered in extremely sticky slime.
Spellbooks.personality: Adjacent objects stick to the book with great force.

Spellbooks.name: Anchor
Spellbooks.description: A strong wire sprouts from your arms, affixing itself to two points within 50ft on each side.
Spellbooks.personality: If a rope is pulled through the iron loop on its spine, it becomes as heavy as an elephant.

Spellbooks.name: Animate Object
Spellbooks.description: An object obeys your commands as best it can.
Spellbooks.personality: Moldable like clay. Childish laughter sprouts from its pages.

Spellbooks.name: Anthropomorphize
Spellbooks.description: An animal either gains human intelligence or human appearance for one day.
Spellbooks.personality: Whimpers, purrs and growls depending on its treatment.

Spellbooks.name: Arcane Eye
Spellbooks.description: You can see through a magical floating eyeball that flies around at your command.
Spellbooks.personality: Needs a spritz of water to open.

Spellbooks.name: Astral Prison
Spellbooks.description: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell.
Spellbooks.personality: Silent, abstract, faces scream in anguish within.

Spellbooks.name: Attract
Spellbooks.description: Two objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10 feet.
Spellbooks.personality: Nearby compasses spin uselessly.

Spellbooks.name: Auditory Illusion
Spellbooks.description: You create illusory sounds that seem to come from a direction of your choice.
Spellbooks.personality: Produces random and occasionally inopportune sounds throughout the day.

Spellbooks.name: Babble
Spellbooks.description: A creature must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. It is otherwise mute.
Spellbooks.personality: When the text is read aloud, the words of others become unintelligible.

Spellbooks.name: Bait Flower
Spellbooks.description: A plant sprouts from the ground that emanates the smell of decaying flesh.
Spellbooks.personality: Attracts flies.

Spellbooks.name: Beast Form
Spellbooks.description: You and your possessions transform into a mundane animal.
Spellbooks.personality: Covered in thick fur, its edges lined with small teeth.

Spellbooks.name: Befuddle
Spellbooks.description: A creature of your choice is unable to form new short-term memories for the duration of the spell.
Spellbooks.personality: Its contents shift and change each time it is opened.

Spellbooks.name: Body Swap
Spellbooks.description: You switch bodies with a creature you touch. If one body dies, the other dies as well.
Spellbooks.personality: The front cover shows an image of the last creature to read it.

Spellbooks.name: Charm
Spellbooks.description: A creature you can see treats you as a friend.
Spellbooks.personality: Warm to the touch, and smells of roses.

Spellbooks.name: Command
Spellbooks.description: A target obeys a single three-word command that does not cause it harm.
Spellbooks.personality: Grows thinner over time, until finally disappearing forever.

Spellbooks.name: Comprehend
Spellbooks.description: You become fluent in all languages for a short while.
Spellbooks.personality: Drips letters, staining whatever it touches.

Spellbooks.name: Cone of Foam
Spellbooks.description: Dense foam sprays from your hand, coating the target.
Spellbooks.personality: Spongy and moist with a soapy residue.

Spellbooks.name: Control Plants
Spellbooks.description: Nearby plants and trees obey you and gain the ability to move at a slow pace.
Spellbooks.personality: Leaves grow along the spine, and it smells faintly of decay.

Spellbooks.name: Control Weather
Spellbooks.description: You may alter the type of weather at will, but you do not otherwise control it.
Spellbooks.personality: Highly resistant to fire and water damage.

Spellbooks.name: Cure Wounds
Spellbooks.description: Restore 1d4 STR per day to a creature you can touch.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells of vinegar and thyme. Turns red after use.

Spellbooks.name: Deafen
Spellbooks.description: All nearby creatures are deafened.
Spellbooks.personality: Nearby instruments occasionally sound off, as if in protest.

Spellbooks.name: Detect Magic
Spellbooks.description: You can see or hear nearby magical auras.
Spellbooks.personality: Becomes warm to the touch if magic is used nearby.

Spellbooks.name: Disassemble
Spellbooks.description: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.
Spellbooks.personality: Regenerates any torn or defaced pages.

Spellbooks.name: Disguise
Spellbooks.description: You may alter the appearance of one character at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.
Spellbooks.personality: The surface makes a perfect mirror.

Spellbooks.name: Displace
Spellbooks.description: An object appears to be up to 15ft from its actual position.
Spellbooks.personality: Bits of string, clothing, and leaves are sometimes stuffed inside.

Spellbooks.name: Earthquake
Spellbooks.description: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.
Spellbooks.personality: Sand dribbles from the corners, seemingly without stop.

Spellbooks.name: Elasticity
Spellbooks.description: Your body can stretch up to 10ft.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells of taffy, and is very flexible.

Spellbooks.name: Elemental Wall
Spellbooks.description: A straight wall of ice or fire 50ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.
Spellbooks.personality: Skin and warmer substances stick to it after use.

Spellbooks.name: Filch
Spellbooks.description: A visible item teleports to your hands.
Spellbooks.personality: An ally's prized possession may occasionally be found tucked between its covers.

Spellbooks.name: Fish Lung
Spellbooks.description: A target can breathe underwater until they surface again.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells strongly of the sea. Attracts wild animals.

Spellbooks.name: Flare
Spellbooks.description: A bright ball of energy fires a trail of light into the sky, revealing your location to friend or foe.
Spellbooks.personality: Faintly glows in complete darkness.

Spellbooks.name: Fog Cloud
Spellbooks.description: A dense fog spreads out from you.
Spellbooks.personality: When submersed in water, the book eventually turns all the liquid to vapor.

Spellbooks.name: Frenzy
Spellbooks.description: A nearby creature erupts in a frenzy of violence.
Spellbooks.personality: Rough, sandpaper cover that destroys any book it touches.

Spellbooks.name: Gate
Spellbooks.description: A portal to a random plane opens.
Spellbooks.personality: A large hole is carved into the center, ending in a void. Items dropped within are never seen again.

Spellbooks.name: Gravity Shift
Spellbooks.description: You can change the direction of gravity, but only for yourself.
Spellbooks.personality: Attaches itself to the largest object nearby.

Spellbooks.name: Greed
Spellbooks.description: A creature develops the overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.
Spellbooks.personality: The cover changes depending on the owner, subtly hinting at their deepest desires.

Spellbooks.name: Haste
Spellbooks.description: Your movement speed is tripled.
Spellbooks.personality: Pages flip wildly while open. Can cause paper cuts.

Spellbooks.name: Hatred
Spellbooks.description: A creature develops a deep hatred of another creature or group and wishes to destroy them.
Spellbooks.personality: Long term exposure to the book can cause suspicion, paranoia and distrust of others.

Spellbooks.name: Hear Whispers
Spellbooks.description: You can hear faint sounds clearly.
Spellbooks.personality: The reader's voice is amplified for a short period of time afterwards.

Spellbooks.name: Hover
Spellbooks.description: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to one humanoid.
Spellbooks.personality: Floats if dropped.

Spellbooks.name: Hypnotize
Spellbooks.description: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer one yes or no question you ask it.
Spellbooks.personality: Eye-catching, swirling spirals don its covers.

Spellbooks.name: Icy Touch
Spellbooks.description: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to 10ft in radius.
Spellbooks.personality: Gloves required. Nonflammable.

Spellbooks.name: Identify Owner
Spellbooks.description: Letters appear over the object you touch, spelling out the name of the object's owners, if there are any.
Spellbooks.personality: The book's interior lists the name of its previous owner.

Spellbooks.name: Illuminate
Spellbooks.description: A floating light moves as you command.
Spellbooks.personality: When held in light, the pages become a prism of vibrant rainbows.

Spellbooks.name: Invisible Tether
Spellbooks.description: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.
Spellbooks.personality: Its pages are not attached by glue or thread, yet stay together nonetheless.

Spellbooks.name: Knock
Spellbooks.description: A nearby mundane or magical lock unlocks loudly.
Spellbooks.personality: Locked. A new owner 'produces' the key after their next meal.

Spellbooks.name: Leap
Spellbooks.description: You jump up to 10ft high, once.
Spellbooks.personality: When thrown, it just keeps going.

Spellbooks.name: Liquid Air
Spellbooks.description: The air around you becomes swimmable.
Spellbooks.personality: Floats of its own volition, bouncing off of whatever it touches.

Spellbooks.name: Magic Dampener
Spellbooks.description: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.
Spellbooks.personality: Relics within 100ft of the spellbook cannot be recharged.

Spellbooks.name: Manse
Spellbooks.description: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.
Spellbooks.personality: If left inside, both the book and the cottage vanish forever.

Spellbooks.name: Marble Craze
Spellbooks.description: Your pockets are full of marbles and will refill every 30 seconds.
Spellbooks.personality: When jostled, makes a playful rattling sound.

Spellbooks.name: Masquerade
Spellbooks.description: A character's appearance and voice becomes identical to those of a character you touch.
Spellbooks.personality: Extended use causes the owner to develop unconscious yet noticeable tics.

Spellbooks.name: Miniaturize
Spellbooks.description: A creature you touch is shrunk down to the size of a mouse.
Spellbooks.personality: The text is ludicrously, comically large.

Spellbooks.name: Mirror Image
Spellbooks.description: An illusory duplicate of yourself appears and is under your control.
Spellbooks.personality: Over time, the owner begins to question who is the original, and who is the duplicate.

Spellbooks.name: Mirrorwalk
Spellbooks.description: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.
Spellbooks.personality: Will not open unless the owner politely knocks on the cover.

Spellbooks.name: Multiarm
Spellbooks.description: You temporarily gain an extra arm.
Spellbooks.personality: After use, the caster is wracked with phantom limb syndrome for a day.

Spellbooks.name: Night Sphere
Spellbooks.description: A 50ft-wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears before you.
Spellbooks.personality: Displays a prominent constellation on its cover.

Spellbooks.name: Objectify
Spellbooks.description: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.
Spellbooks.personality: The owner experiences intense pareidolia for days after use.

Spellbooks.name: Ooze Form
Spellbooks.description: You become a living jelly.
Spellbooks.personality: Slowly drips an acid that eventually eats away anything it touches.

Spellbooks.name: Pacify
Spellbooks.description: A creature near you has an aversion to violence.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells of jasmine and incense. Attracts children.

Spellbooks.name: Phobia
Spellbooks.description: A nearby creature becomes terrified of an object of your choice.
Spellbooks.personality: Over time, haunting, abstract art begins to fill its pages.

Spellbooks.name: Pit
Spellbooks.description: A pit 10ft wide and 10ft deep opens in the ground.
Spellbooks.personality: A standard piton can be safely stored in its spine.

Spellbooks.name: Primal Surge
Spellbooks.description: A creature rapidly evolves into a future version of its species.
Spellbooks.personality: The owner is haunted by strange visions of their own ancestors.

Spellbooks.name: Push/Pull
Spellbooks.description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you or pushed directly away from you with the strength of one man.
Spellbooks.personality: Any force against the book is comically amplified.

Spellbooks.name: Raise Dead
Spellbooks.description: A skeleton rises from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.
Spellbooks.personality: The owner becomes more and more fascinated with bones after each use.

Spellbooks.name: Raise Spirit
Spellbooks.description: The spirit of a nearby corpse manifests and will answer 1 question.
Spellbooks.personality: The answers (but not their questions) are forever inscribed in its pages.

Spellbooks.name: Read Mind
Spellbooks.description: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.
Spellbooks.personality: Long-term possession can cause the reader to mistake the thoughts of others as their own.

Spellbooks.name: Repel
Spellbooks.description: Two objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other within 10 feet.
Spellbooks.personality: Closed by two powerful straps that spring open at inopportune times.

Spellbooks.name: Scry
Spellbooks.description: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.
Spellbooks.personality: The owner's eyes turn milky-white for an hour after use.

Spellbooks.name: Sculpt Elements
Spellbooks.description: Inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.
Spellbooks.personality: Slowly decays on contact with wood or cloth. Bury in dirt or submerge in water to refresh.

Spellbooks.name: Sense
Spellbooks.description: Choose one kind of object (key, gold, arrow, jug, etc). You can sense the nearest example.
Spellbooks.personality: The book's previous owner is always aware of the book's current location.

Spellbooks.name: Shield
Spellbooks.description: A creature you touch is protected from mundane attacks for one minute.
Spellbooks.personality: Bound in rusty ring-mail and is quite heavy. If held, provides +1 Armor.

Spellbooks.name: Shroud
Spellbooks.description: A creature you touch is invisible until they move.
Spellbooks.personality: Invisible to any but the book's current owner.

Spellbooks.name: Shuffle
Spellbooks.description: Two creatures you can see instantly switch places.
Spellbooks.personality: If stolen but not yet read, it reappears wherever its owner last left it.

Spellbooks.name: Sleep
Spellbooks.description: A creature you can see falls into a light sleep.
Spellbooks.personality: Soft as a pillow, but yields only fitful sleep.

Spellbooks.name: Slick
Spellbooks.description: Every surface in a 30ft radius becomes extremely slippery.
Spellbooks.personality: Gloves are required for handling, lest the book is dropped in a most comical fashion.

Spellbooks.name: Smoke Form
Spellbooks.description: Your body becomes a living smoke that you can control.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells of campfire. The pages cannot be burnt, but are very sensitive to moisture.

Spellbooks.name: Sniff
Spellbooks.description: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.
Spellbooks.personality: Expresses a strong odor detectable only by its owner.

Spellbooks.name: Snuff
Spellbooks.description: The source of any mundane light you can see is instantly snuffed out.
Spellbooks.personality: If left in one place for long periods, nearby light sources eventually dim, then finally go out.

Spellbooks.name: Sort
Spellbooks.description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set.
Spellbooks.personality: Rights itself when dropped or thrown.

Spellbooks.name: Skillful Repair
Spellbooks.description: You make minor repairs to a nonliving object.
Spellbooks.personality: Sewn from the vellum of one hundred books, no two pages are alike.

Spellbooks.name: Spellsaw
Spellbooks.description: A whirling blade flies from your chest, clearing any plant material in its way. It is otherwise harmless.
Spellbooks.personality: Wrapped in stained leather, it should be oiled at least once a month.

Spellbooks.name: Spider Climb
Spellbooks.description: You can climb surfaces like a spider.
Spellbooks.personality: New cobwebs must be pushed aside prior to each use. They are hard to remove.

Spellbooks.name: Swarm
Spellbooks.description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You can only be harmed by blast attacks.
Spellbooks.personality: Easily broken into a dozen distinct parts that slowly move towards one another over time.

Spellbooks.name: Telekinesis
Spellbooks.description: You may mentally 1 move item under 60lbs.
Spellbooks.personality: The owner can summon the book through mental command alone (WIL save or become deprived afterwards).

Spellbooks.name: Telepathy
Spellbooks.description: Two creatures can hear each other's thoughts, no matter how far apart.
Spellbooks.personality: The holder can hear (but not respond) to the thoughts of whoever last possessed it, and vice versa.

Spellbooks.name: Teleport
Spellbooks.description: An object or person you can see is transported from one place to another in a 50ft radius.
Spellbooks.personality: Can be destroyed to create a portal to another dimension.

Spellbooks.name: Target Lure
Spellbooks.description: An object you touch becomes the target of any nearby spell.
Spellbooks.personality: Attracts all manner of magical creatures, spell leaks, and scrying.

Spellbooks.name: Thicket
Spellbooks.description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to 50ft wide suddenly sprouts up.
Spellbooks.personality: Wrapped in vines that must be destroyed again with each use.

Spellbooks.name: Passage
Spellbooks.description: Creates a temporary path through wood, stone or brick.
Spellbooks.personality: An object dropped on top of the book inevitably falls through the other side.

Spellbooks.name: Time Control
Spellbooks.description: Time in a 50ft bubble slows down or increases by 10% for 30 seconds.
Spellbooks.personality: Alternates its appearance as either impossibly old or freshly written.

Spellbooks.name: True Sight
Spellbooks.description: You see through all nearby illusions.
Spellbooks.personality: Cannot be concealed by magic, and sticks out like a sore thumb.

Spellbooks.name: Upwell
Spellbooks.description: A spring of seawater appears.
Spellbooks.personality: Hardened leather bindings caked in salt and living barnacles.

Spellbooks.name: Vision
Spellbooks.description: You completely control what a creature sees.
Spellbooks.personality: An unnerving, lidless eye graces the front cover.

Spellbooks.name: Visual Illusion
Spellbooks.description: A silent, immobile, room-sized illusion of your choice appears.
Spellbooks.personality: Filled with rich, colorful pages very much like a children's bedtime story.

Spellbooks.name: Ward
Spellbooks.description: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.
Spellbooks.personality: The covers are decorated with bizarre, otherworldly creatures with thousands of eyes.

Spellbooks.name: Web
Spellbooks.description: Your wrists shoot thick webbing.
Spellbooks.personality: The text is alien, yet somehow intelligible, for it is the language of dreams.

Spellbooks.name: Widget
Spellbooks.description: A primitive version of a drawn tool or item appears before you and disappears after a short time.
Spellbooks.personality: Smells of iron and rust, sweat and effort. Faint sounds of harsh labor emanate from deep within its pages.

Spellbooks.name: Wizard Mark
Spellbooks.description: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects.
Spellbooks.personality: Inside the front cover is a small pocket containing a thin pad of paper, listing the name and date of death of all previous owners.

Spellbooks.name: X-Ray Vision
Spellbooks.description: You can see through walls, dirt, clothing, etc.
Spellbooks.personality: Long-term exposure can cause hair loss, blurry vision, and fatigue.
